info.name: Agenda bot
info.summary: 🤖 Transform your Talk meetings with intelligent agenda management, real-time time tracking, and automated progress monitoring!
info.description:
### 🚀 Meeting Management for Nextcloud Talk
Tired of unproductive meetings that run overtime? The Agenda Bot transforms chaotic discussions into structured, efficient sessions with intelligent automation and real-time insights.
### ✨ Key Features
#### 🎯 Effortless Agenda Creation - Natural language: `agenda: Project review (15 min)` - Multiple formats: `topic:`, `item:`, `add:`, `insert:` - Create multiple items at once from structured lists - Smart time parsing: `(5 min)`, `(1h)`, `(90 min)`, `(2 hours)` - Automatic positioning or manual `#2.` syntax
#### ⏰ Intelligent Time Management - Background monitoring tracks time automatically - Smart warnings at 80%, 100%, and overtime thresholds - Call-aware notifications (only during active meetings) - Visual progress tracking with ➡️ ✅ 📍 indicators
#### 🔥 Seamless Meeting Flow - **`done:` command** - Complete current item and auto-advance! - Real-time status shows actual vs. planned time - Automatic progression through agenda items - Live updates for all participants
#### 🔐 Smart Permission System - Role-based access: Owners, Moderators, Users, Guests - Flexible control: Who can add, manage, or view items - Guest moderator support for external facilitators
#### 📊 Meeting Analytics & Insights - Completion tracking with timing statistics - Efficiency reports: On-time 👍 vs. overtime ⏰ - Comprehensive summaries with actionable data - Optional cleanup of completed items
### 💫 Why Using Agenda Bot?
✅ **Boost Productivity** - Stay focused with structured agendas ✅ **Save Time** - Automated tracking and progress management ✅ **Improve Accountability** - Clear completion tracking ✅ **Reduce Overruns** - Smart time warnings keep meetings on track ✅ **Easy Setup** - Works instantly in any Talk room
### 🏆 Perfect For - Team standups and regular check-ins - Project planning sessions - Client meetings with tight schedules - Board meetings requiring structure - Training sessions with timed modules
Start having better meetings - Add the Agenda Bot to your Talk rooms and experience the difference!

## 1.3.2 - Summary Header & Reaction Cleanup Fix
### 🔧 Enhanced - **Enhanced agenda summary header**: Increased agenda summary message header from H3 to H2 for better visibility - Visual prominence improvement makes meeting summaries more attention-grabbing
### 🛠️ Fixed - **Reaction-based cleanup false positives**: Fixed overly broad cleanup detection that triggered on unrelated messages - Removed problematic fallback logic that caused cleanup to trigger when reacting to messages containing "agenda" or "summary" - Cleanup via reactions now only works on confirmed agenda summary messages (proper bot-generated summaries) - Prevents false positive cleanups while preserving legitimate summary cleanup functionality
## 1.3.1 - Time Monitor Bot Name Fix
### 🛠️ Fixed - **TimeMonitorService bot name localization**: Fixed time monitoring messages to use proper localized bot name - Time warnings now appear from "Agenda bot" instead of "agenda_bot-bot" - Consistent with BotService naming convention using translation keys - Supports all configured languages (English, German) with proper localization
## 1.3.0 - Bulk Agenda Import
### 🚀 New Features - **Bulk agenda creation**: Create multiple agenda items with a single message using structured list format - **Copy-paste workflow**: Perfect for importing agendas from calendar invitations, meeting templates, or external tools - **Flexible bullet format**: Support for both `-` and `*` bullet point markers in bulk import - **Safety limits**: Maximum 20 items per bulk operation to prevent abuse - **Error resilience**: Graceful handling of invalid items while processing valid ones
### 🔧 Enhancements - Enhanced message processing with bulk format detection (takes priority over single items) - Intelligent sequential positioning with conflict resolution - Complete translation support in English and German for all bulk operation messages - Updated help system with bulk format examples and usage instructions
### 🎯 Usage Example ``` agenda: - Welcome & introductions (5 min) - Project status review (20 min) - Budget discussion (15 min) - Next steps planning (10 min) - Closing remarks ```
### 📚 Documentation - Updated README.md with "Bulk Agenda Creation" section - Enhanced help integration with bulk format examples
